}}'''Éowin''' was the [[Second Marshal of the Riddermark|Second Master]] of the [[Rohan|Mark]] on the early stage of ''[[The Lord of the Rings|The Lord of the Ring's]]'' composition process.<ref>{{TI|Riders}}, pp. 393-4</ref> This character was abandoned by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and did not remain in the final text of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
